name: Shape Escape (itch) (Kettleman)
description:
I made this at college for a project themed around randomness. I had lots of fun making this and any constructive criticism is greatly appreciated.

CONTROLS : WASD OR LEFT ANALOGUE TO MOVE. ARROW KEYS OR RIGHT ANALOGUE TO SHOOT. ESC OR B TO QUIT.

Music by INFRNL https://www.youtube.com/channel/UClc4k7Zq0UOr6hRf3qUH-oA
